sentences.en: But rapture was glowing in my soul and it overcame my terror.
sentences.cn: 但我内心里的狂喜,压过了我的恐惧.

sentences.en: Charles listened with rapture to her singing.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯兴致勃勃地听她演唱。

sentences.en: He quaffed the swelling rapture of life from the foaming goblet of the infinite.
sentences.cn: 他从那穹苍的起泡的杯中,痛饮充满生命的狂喜.

sentences.en: His cup was full , and he hugged her to his heart with rapture.
sentences.cn: 他高兴到了极点, 狂喜地把她搂在怀里.

sentences.en: I have read it a hundred times with new rapture.
sentences.cn: 我读过一百遍,每读一遍,都是欢喜欲狂的.

sentences.en: I stare in rapture at the ball.
In a spasm of rapture he tears off his chains.
In the open air their rapture broke into speech.
sentences.cn: 来到户外,他们如醉如痴的狂喜迸发成语言.

sentences.en: Oliver sat by one of the windows , listening to the sweet music, in a perfect rapture.
sentences.cn: 奥立弗就坐在一座窗台旁边, 听着美妙的音乐出神.

sentences.en: She listened with rapture to the sweet music.
sentences.cn: 她着迷地听着那美妙的音乐.

sentences.en: She was in the seventh heaven of rapture.
That had been a night of unmixed joy and rapture.
sentences.cn: 那是充满了真挚的快乐和狂欢的一夜.

sentences.en: The boys gazed up at him in rapture.
sentences.cn: 男孩们欣喜若狂地抬头注视着他。

sentences.en: The dream had been worth suffering for the sake of this sudden rapture.
sentences.cn: 担惊受怕后能得到这突如其来的快乐,还是值得的.

sentences.en: The reviews for "On a Clear Day" ran the gamut from contempt to qualified rapture .
sentences.cn: 对于《好日子》的影评毁誉参半，既有人表示不值一提，也有人觉得它带给人一定的惊喜。

sentences.en: What joy, what rapture, what glory to see him again!
sentences.cn: 再见到他是多么高兴、多么欢欣、多么美妙的事啊！

words.tran_cn: 狂喜的；兴高采烈的；欢天喜地的
